transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Namaste ma'am.
Executive: Haan ji sir. Namaste sir, kaise hain?
Customer: Bahut badhiya hai, badhiya hai ji.
Executive: Ji sir bataiye aap matlab aapka issue raise hua tha ki aap Jitender ji ko bhi bata rahe the ki aapke paas buylead nahi aa rahi proper.
Customer: Madam baat aisi hai.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Dekho, jo humne matlab ki dekha hai, humne dekha uska survey kiya hai. Jaise na koi maine usme jo aapke paas message dala hai, matlab ki mail dali hai, usme usme mention bhi kiya hai. Meri matlab ki na mera desi tarika jime asi desi bande aa. Desi tika samjhan da main sun liyo pehla ta ode vich ta pani wala samjhaya si. Saada maksad ehe hai ji, sanne jo sadde naal commitment kiti hai. Saade
mere kole do leeda aaniya ne, char leeda aaniya ne, sanu koi dikkat nahi. Asi ohi leeda de vich jinna santusht aa. Saadi ichha je asi vadhaana chahange, asi vadhaan di ichha asi vadhavange. Par saada maksad ehe hai vi jime apne tamola wale 100 number hunde ne ji. Meri udharan sun liyo, usdu baad tusi kahoge. Tamola khelde aa na ji, bachche koi bhi khelde ne, ode vich 100 number hunde ne ji.
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: 100 number aapne ode vich fenkte aapne. Ode vichon karan ki hunda? Mann lo, kise bandeya ne paise laane ne, kise ne apne bande 20 fit karte ji. Kise ne 10 fit karte, jinni ki jidi power si. Kise ne panch fit karte. Sanne matlab ki power si asi ek banda fit karta. Main ehe nahi kehnda, mann lo samjhan di gal aa, maine ek banda fit karta. Ode vich jadon dikri da number nikleya, oh chahe jinu marzi nikle aave, chahe 20 wale nu nikle aave, chahe ek wale nu nikle aave, panch wale nu nikle aave, oh is hisab naal nikalda. Sanu koi issue nahi. Par jida IndiaMART wallo, jide bandeya ne 20 wala kita hoya ji, ohnu ta 20 wala upron santta, vi jide number aande ne, leeda aandiya ne, jidiya vadiya leeda ne, ohnu uthe hi santeya janda. Sanu jida kood kwad, matlab ki sabto niche wala sannni wala, oh sanu oh ditta janda ji. Saada ta ehe maksad aa, hor sanu koi maksad nahi. Saadiya leeda cho asi sotho vadh nahi bhalde, sonu koi oh nahi kehnde. Saada maksad ehe aa vi jo leeda kyuki gal is tarah ma'am, pehla asi mannde aa, vi saade kaniyo aen ni vi bachche karigar nahi si, bachche karigar si. Bachche anjaan nahi si, par ode kaniyo untouch si. Hun balke na, jida bachcha saada engineer karda, asi ohnu bhi matlab ki ode utte bitha dene aa ji. Saada jida matlab ki survey ho reha, bachche matlab ki ode vichon aa rahe ne saare. Ahi bachche saare trained ho gaye, jadon thodi lead aandi aa, asi naal di naal chakkde aa. Madam saver to leke shaam tikkar thodiya leeda hi nahi aandiya ji saade kole dasso ki karange ji asi. Thodiya leeda saade kole 100 honiya chahidiya ne, asi thode kolo ek lead leni aa, char leeda leniya ne, asi sotho unni hi lavange na, oh ta thode kole touch aa. Par tusi aen samajh lo, saade kole leeda hi vi tusi thode kole saada by record aa ji. Saade kole ta baad di gal aa, thode kole saada kalla kalla record aa. Tusi ode vich dasso ji saade kole vi leeda saade kole aa aagyi aa ji.
Executive: Sir, sir main samajh gayi aap ye keh rahe hain ki matlab matlab aap ye kehna chah rahe hain ki jo matlab leads aa rahi hain but aapke paas tak wo properly aa nahi pa rahi hain. Aur aapne matlab do person jo aapke yahan dekh bhi rahe hain aur unko hum guide bhi kar rahe hain ki kaise use karna hai but lead hi nahi proper aa pa rahi hain aapke paas mein right?
Customer: Haan, jidiya matlab ki mera kehn da maksad ehe aa jime na, aapa keh dene aa vi tooti aapne khol li full, samjhan da mere kolo jida bhi cheez aayi. Ek ta jide thoda matlab ki jida saada maksad sanu dassya gaya si, vi thode kole ek lead aau, do leeda aaniya jidiya thode net de utte matlab ki, oh ta thode kole jida oh aa, ode vichon sara kuch show karuga na ji. Jime hun 15 din di lead chal rahi hai ji. Jadon koi cheez asi lead aandi aa naal di naal chakk lene aa, oh naal di naal gap ho jandi hai ji, kyon ho jandi hai? Asi nahi mannde ji ehe vi matlab ki vi lead leti gayi, oh khatam kiti jandi hai saade kaniyo lead jikar. Te saada saada maksad ehe hai ji, vi jo lead aave saade kole, mann lo do aan, ek aan, jo thodiya full bata full waliya leeda ne, ode vichon dasso. Ja sanu ehe cheez dassi jandi, vi jida thoda 4 lakh da package aa ja 2 lakh da package aa, ohnu asi is tarah karke oh leeda dinne aa. Jida 50,000 da reh janda ohnu aad leeda dinne aa. Jida saada 30,000 da, 20,000 da reh janda ohnu jidiya jame hi khatam hoiya hoiya leeda ne, asi oh dinne aa.
Executive: Sir aisa nahi hai matlab ki lead aapke pattern panel pe show nahi hongi ya jaise aapka package ka difference hai isliye aisa nahi hoga ki aapke panel pe show nahi hongi bilkul.
Customer: Madam wo hai ji. Aap batao ji aapke paas hamara sara by data hai aap batao vi ji hamare paas je leeda aayi hai. Shanivar ko bhi nahi aayi. Shanivar ko fir main Chandigarh sari baat kiti ji. Matlab ki sari matlab ki jisne aapka package liya hai usne mujhe sara kuch dikhaya kehte je dekh kehte lead matlab ki show ho rahi hai hum usme se uthate hain koi bhi uthate hain is tarah. Te saade kole dasso ji tusi kehda vi kidiya leeda show hundiya ne, saade kole ta jidiya tuttiya futtiya leeda sonne bhejiya hoiya ne. Matlab ki jime oh aaga te jime na tusi aapa keh do ji bachcha hunda, hello, ma'am sun rahe ho?
Executive: Haan ji sir.
Customer: Haan, jaise na matlab ki koi bachcha kaam nahi kar raha ya koi ko humne usko tankha nahi deni ya koi wo aise hai vi kharab wo hai, usko hum bol dete hai. Chal koi baat nahi aap bahar baith jao, usko matlab ki 10 kaam usko matlab ki dusra jo kar raha hai theek hai vi ek kaam wo bhag bhi na jaye vi chhoot bhi na jaye usko us hisab se kaam de do fir. Hamare sath to wo kaam ho raha hai hum bakayda survey karke keh rahe hai aise nahi apne hath se nahi keh rahe ma'am. Hamare paas iska pura hai matlab ki aapke paas aap mano chahe na mano aap by record nahi waha apne jo senior se baat karoge waha karoge waha maan jaoge par je baat final hai aap batao vi hamare paas full lead kaise aati hai. Aapne upar se fenk di. Hamare paas jis hisab se hai hum usko utha le hame koi dikkat nahi hai ji. Wo hamari kismat reh gayi hum aapka sath us hisab se lenge fir aap humse puchenge ma'am aap aise karke hamari lead nahi aayi wo koi baat nahi hai hum aap se support le lenge ji. Wo alag baat hai. Par
Executive: Sir, sir, haan sir dekhiye lead to aayi hui hai abhi kya hoga ki aap jaise jo aapke yahan kaun dekh raha hai main ek kaam karti hu na main ek whatsapp group bana deti hu jisme aapka number add kar dete hain aapke account manager ka number add kar dete hain aur jo aapke yahan se do log IndiaMART dekh rahe hain na unka number bhi sir hum add kar dete hain usme. Theek hai ji. To jaise ki abhi lead main bhi check kar rahi thi recent aap jaise relevant tab mein dekhte hoge to relevant tab mein kya hota hai ki aapki matlab aap kahan se lead utha rahe ho.
Haan ji. Hello.
Executive: Haan ji haan kis mein ji? Aap jo hai na aap jo hai na lead check kiya karo aap recent wale mein check kiya karo aap dekhiye aapne kaise abhi open kiya hua hai laptop mein ya phone mein?
Customer: Laptop pe chal raha hai ji.
Executive: Theek hai uske side dekhiye buylead wala tab open kariye aap ek baar.
Customer: Haan ki open karna? Aa galat khul gayi.
Customer: Aa bol.
Executive: Hello good morning ma'am.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Good morning ma'am.
Customer: Ma'am main ye keh rahi hu aap abhi video meeting pe connect kar sakte ho kya taki main aur achi tarike se aapko guide kar paun.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji sir ma'am karu.
Executive: Theek hai main aapko na sabse pehle main ek aapka group bana de rahi hu whatsapp group usme sabke number abhi add kar rahi hu usme hi main link share kar deti hu fir aap apna number bhi bhej dena main aapka number bhi add kar dungi usme.
Customer: Okay ma'am okay.
Executive: Theek hai main aapka pehle video meeting ka link schedule karke aapko update karti hu.
Customer: Theek hai ma'am okay. Okay ma'am.
Executive: Mujhe do minute ka time dijiye.
Customer: Haan ma'am.
Executive: Haan ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving proper buyleads despite paid subscription.

- Feels leads are filtered based on package value.

- Believes smaller packages receive lower quality leads.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the issue and apologized.

- Executive offered to create a WhatsApp group.

- Group to include customer, account manager, and IndiaMART representatives.

- Executive suggested checking the 'recent' tab for leads.

- Executive offered a video meeting for better guidance.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will schedule a video meeting.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, lead quality, whatsapp group, video meeting
